Whether you're running errands around town or taking it easy, this classic hoodie lets you do it your way. 

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source." 

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learnmore

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source." 

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learnmore

description:
Description
A win for boys of all ages. This kids' adidas long sleeve tee is made of soft cotton jersey fabric and features a ribbed collar and cuffs for easy, everyday versatility Football-inspired graphics combine hand-drawn and photorealistic elements.

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future.  

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products. However, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source." 

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learn more

One universal fact about kids: They are always growing and changing — and their bodies are, too. That's why we now offer kids' extended sizing for our most popular apparel. Because kids deserve great-fitting, functional gear they can feel confident wearing.

For years, our industry has used phrases like "plus size" and "husky size" to label some kids' changing bodies. Our extended sizing isn't about labeling, it's about updating our size range to make it easier for children (and their parents) to find that just-right size.
Details
Regular Fit
60% cotton, 40% polyester jersey

Machine washable

One universal fact about kids: They are always growing and changing — and their bodies are, too. That's why we now offer kids' extended sizing for our most popular apparel. Because kids deserve great-fitting, functional gear they can feel confident wearing.

For years, our industry has used phrases like "plus size" and "husky size" to label some kids' changing bodies. Our extended sizing isn't about labeling, it's about updating our size range to make it easier for children (and their parents) to find that just-right size.

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products. However, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source."

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future.  

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products. However, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source."

description:
Description
FULLY WATERPROOF TECHNICAL MOUNTAIN PANTS WITH A SOFT-SHELL FEEL.
Set your sights on the summit. With enough stretch to move and bend naturally and a clean, low-profile design, these adidas Terrex Techrock pants are made for the demands of technical mountaineering. Their lightweight design features a hybrid of 2.5- and 3-layer fabrics featuring adidas PRIMEKNIT for an unrestricted feel and RAIN.RDY to seal out wind and water. They set the standard for soft-shell-like mobility with the durability and waterproof coverage of a hard shell. The minimalist design includes technical details that make a difference when you are focused on moving in the mountains. Low-profile cuffs with silicone grip elastic and a lace hook stay in place over boots and are slim enough to fit under boot gaiters without creating bulk. The waist is harness-friendly, and secure leg pocket is accessible while wearing a harness. Traditional hand pockets offer routine use without a harness. The densely woven materials resists abrasion while maintaining easy movement and a lightweight feel.
Details
Belted waist with low-profile snap fly
adidas PRIMEKNIT 87% nylon, 13% elastane tricot
RAIN.RDY
Zip hand pockets and zip side pocket accessible through climbing harness
Molded easy-grab zipper pulls
Bottom legs can be tucked into or worn over mountaineering boots
Reflective details

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future.  

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products. However, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source."

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source."

THIS QUARTER-ZIP LONG SLEEVE TEE IS MADE WITH NATURE.
Escape the bustle of the city in this adidas quarter-zip top. Crafted from a smooth modal blend, it's made to reconnect you with nature's calm. Its subdued style blends into any scene so you can slow down, find your Zen and simply be. 

This product has been made with at least 70% renewable materials. Switching to renewable material sources offers more options to reduce our reliance on finite resources. We choose renewable materials because they are natural resources that can be  planted and grown  again. This is unlike fossil fuel based materials, which once used, we cannot replenish.

Renewable materials are not only natural materials, but also bio-synthetic materials that have a plant feedstock  instead of fossil fuel. 

This feedstock is  chemically processed into intermediate substances and  is turned into synthetic materials in the end.

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future.

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source".

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source."

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products. However, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source."

One universal fact about kids: They are always growing and changing — and their bodies are, too. That's why we now offer kids' extended sizing for our most popular apparel. Because kids deserve great-fitting, functional gear they can feel confident wearing.
